intro: Manglesia glabrata, commonly known as the smooth manglesia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is often found in coastal areas and sandy soils, where it contributes to local biodiversity. The plant's fibrous roots and drought tolerance make it an important component of its ecosystem.
